name: Intel AI for Enterprise Retrieval-augmented Generation搜索路径不受控漏洞
description: Intel AI for Enterprise Retrieval-augmented Generation是一种通过结合外部知识库增强大型语言模型（LLM）回答准确性和相关性的技术框架。Intel AI for Enterprise Retrieval-augmented Generation存在搜索路径不受控漏洞，攻击者可利用该漏洞导致权限提升。
solution:
目前厂商已发布升级程序修复该安全问题，详情见厂商官网:
https://intel.com/content/www/us/en/security-center/advisory/intel-sa-01338.html
patch: Intel AI for Enterprise Retrieval-augmented Generation搜索路径不受控漏洞的补丁
